trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en serialiserbar mängd tjänstmetadata i XML-format.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSet class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MetadataSet innehåller en samling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>objekt, som innehåller en dialekt av metadata i XML-format.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the MetadataSet class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Normalt används klassen MetadataSet till att överföra en grupp av metadata i XML-dokument till och från <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>objekt, till exempel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: To create a MetadataSet from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Så här skapar du en MetadataSet från en <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>objekt av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, använda den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hämta en <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>objekt av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, använda den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a MetadataSet from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Du kan dessutom använda den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>metod för att läsa in en MetadataSet från XML-data och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A>metod för att skriva interna metadata till XML-format.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Den här typen implementerar strukturen har definierats i WS-MetadataExchange-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objektet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> klass som innehåller den angivna samlingen med <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>från `sections`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: Metadata-värden som den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> ska innehålla.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> objekt som visas i den serialiserade formen av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> objekt som visas i den serialiserade formen av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objekt som representerar metadata.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objekt som representerar metadata.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> från den angivna <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>från en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: Att läsa i XML-läsaren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> som innehåller metadata som finns i XML-dataström.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Läsaren är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Implementerar <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>metod för att ge stöd för serialisering.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> method and accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>-objektet som beskriver XML-representation av det objekt som produceras av det <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> metod och har åtkomst till den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> metod.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementerar den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>metod för att stödja deserialisering från XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: Läsaren ska användas vid läsning av XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Läsaren är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementerar den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>metod som har stöd för serialisering till XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: Skrivare som ska användas vid skrivning XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skrivaren är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> to XML using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Skriver den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> till XML med hjälp av angivna <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>till en XML-dataström.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: Skrivaren kan använda för att skriva XML-filen.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skrivaren är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
